item.title: Zepto 在印度私人信贷交易中为投资者提供 16% 的收益率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度快速商务公司 Zepto Marketplace Pvt.的创始人正计划通过一项私人信贷交易筹集 150 亿卢比（约合 1.76 亿美元）的资金，该交易将为投资者提供高达 16% 的收益率。【原文：The founders of Indian quick commerce company Zepto Marketplace Pvt. are planning to raise 15 billion rupees ($176 million) in a private credit deal that will offer investors as much as 16% yield, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官以改变企业文化为目标，塑造企业形象
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将探讨英特尔公司新任首席执行官陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）在寻求扭转这家芯片制造商命运的过程中所面临的问题。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King looks at the issues confronting Intel Corp.’s new Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan as he seeks to turn around the chipmaker’s fortunes.】

item.title: 印度不断加强的供应链地位甚至吸引了中国
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们关注印度在供应链中不断上升的地位。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at India’s rising place in supply chains. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普上任百日，S&P 500 指数创 1974 年以来最大跌幅
item.description:

item.title: Canva-Backer FPV Ventures 募集到 5.25 亿美元新基金
item.description: 曾是 Felicis Ventures 投资者的韦斯利-陈（Wesley Chan）与摩根士丹利校友佩加-易卜拉希米（Pegah Ebrahimi —）共同筹集了一支新的风险投资基金，为他们公司 FPV Ventures 的第二支投资基金注入了 5.25 亿美元。【原文：Wesley Chan, a former investor at Felicis Ventures, has raised a new venture capital fund along with Morgan Stanley alum Pegah Ebrahimi — bringing in $525 million for the second investment vehicle at their firm, FPV Ventures.】

item.title: 就在越来越多的美国人需要安全网时，特朗普的削减威胁到了美国人的安全网
item.description:
由于关税引发了对经济衰退的担忧，美国人将面临更高的成本和更少的可依赖资源。【原文：

As tariffs spur worries of an economic downturn, Americans are poised to face higher costs with fewer resources to rely on.

】

item.title: 特朗普与抽象的单边交易艺术
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周将迎来他上任的第 100 天，在这 100 天里，他颠覆了全球贸易体系，引发了美国和世界经济衰退的幽灵，并破坏了美元和美国国债长期以来作为避风港的作用。所有这些都可能给未来 100 天乃至更长的时间蒙上阴影。【原文：Donald Trump will mark his 100th day in office this week having upended the global trading system, provoked the specter of looming recessions for the US and world economies, and undermined the long-standing roles of the dollar and US Treasuries as safe havens. All these things are likely to cast a shadow over the next 100 days and beyond.】

item.title: 智利政府努力说服市场相信其财政审慎
item.description: 智利上周发布的季度财政报告旨在向投资者保证，即使全球贸易战的威胁日益加剧，智利的预算赤字仍在严格控制之下。但并非所有人都信服。【原文：Chile’s quarterly fiscal report last week was designed to reassure investors that the budget deficit remains under tight control, even as the threat of a global trade war mounts. Not everyone was convinced.】

item.title: 印度与法国达成74亿美元购买阵风战斗机协议
item.description: 印度国防部发言人周一表示，印度已签署协议从法国购买26架阵风海洋战斗机，这将加强南亚国家在印度洋地区的海军力量和监视能力。【原文：India has signed a deal to buy 26 Rafale marine fighter jets from France, the defense ministry spokesperson said on Monday, strengthening the South Asian country’s naval presence and surveillance abilities in the Indian Ocean Region.】

item.title: 贝宁州立贷款公司在全国最大首次公开募股后首次亮相便获利颇丰
item.description: 贝宁国家控股的国际工商银行在首次公开募股 1.73 亿美元后，首日交易上涨 6.7%。【原文：Benin’s state-controlled International Bank for Industry and Commerce rose 6.7% in its trading debut following a $173 million initial public offering.】

item.title: 华尔街认为贝森特在市场混乱后对债务采取了安全措施
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的债务管理团队预计将保持财政部销售较长期限证券计划的稳定，尤其是在 29 万亿美元的市场近期出现波动之后。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s debt-management team is expected to keep the department’s plans for sales of longer-dated securities steady, especially after recent swings in the $29 trillion market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称美元疲软将提振美国股市
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）表示，美元疲软将支撑美国企业盈利，帮助美国股市跑赢世界其他国家。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson says the weak dollar will support US corporate earnings, helping the American stock market to outperform the rest of the world.】

item.title: 美国和墨西哥销售量下降导致 Cemex 利润下滑
item.description: 墨西哥水泥生产商 Cemex SAB 公布利润下降，原因是销售量下降，尤其是在国内市场。【原文：Mexican cement maker Cemex SAB reported declining profit amid lower sales volumes, especially in its home market.】

item.title: 丰田工业反弹引发可能的收购目标上涨
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.据报道，丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男计划收购丰田工业公司（Toyota Industries Corp.【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. Chairman Akio Toyoda’s reported plan to buy out Toyota Industries Corp. sparked price gains in other Japanese stocks that could receive similar offers.】

item.title: 药明康德美国销售强劲，营收超出预期
item.description: 药明康德第一季度营收超出分析师预期，得益于在美国的强劲销售，尽管该公司在美国已成为政治目标。【原文：WuXi AppTec Co.’s first-quarter revenue beat analyst expectations, helped by strong sales in the US even though the company has become a political target there.】

item.title: 关税令反向股票指标闪现 "买入 "信号
item.description: 通常情况下，当美股情绪变得如此严峻、波动率升高、分析师纷纷下调回报预期时，风险投资者就会蜂拥而至。【原文：Usually, when sentiment toward US stocks turns this grim, volatility is elevated and analysts are slashing expectations for returns, it’s a cue for risk-taking investors to pile in.】

item.title: 菲律宾希望在会谈中将美国关税降至零
item.description: 东南亚国家贸易部长表示，菲律宾将致力于把美国的关税税率从唐纳德-特朗普总统早些时候宣布的 17% 降为零。【原文：The Philippines will aim to bring down its US tariff rate to zero from the 17% earlier announced by President Donald Trump, the Southeast Asian nation’s trade chief said.】

item.title: 关税威胁使 TDK 的下行展望增添风险情景
item.description: TDK 公司的收入前景远低于分析师的预期，这反映了全球贸易战对从汽车到智能手机等行业的预期影响。【原文：TDK Corp.’s revenue outlook fell well short of analysts’ estimates, reflecting the anticipated fallout from a global trade war on industries from cars to smartphones.】

item.title: 模糊的利润前景为关税动荡中的欧洲股市保驾护航
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师的分析显示，对于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能征收的关税的影响仍含糊其辞的欧洲公司股票正在获得回报。【原文：It’s paying off for shares of European companies that remain vague about the impact of US President Donald Trump’s potential tariffs, according to an analysis by Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 韩国排除在六月大选前与美国达成贸易协议的可能性
item.description: 韩国工业部副部长朴成泽（Park Sung-taek）周一表示，韩国认为在 6 月 3 日总统大选前与美国达成全面贸易协定的可能性不大，理由是所涉及的问题非常复杂，而且政治上存在不确定性。【原文：South Korea sees no chance of clinching a comprehensive trade agreement with the US before a presidential election on June 3, Vice Industry Minister Park Sung-taek said Monday, citing the complexity of the issues involved and political uncertainties.】

item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿称欧洲央行将在年底前酝酿加息
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿认为，欧洲央行将在今年年底前开始考虑加息，因为该地区的国防开支可能会使经济升温。【原文：The European Central Bank will pivot to start considering an interest-rate hike by the end of this year, according to Franklin Templeton, as the region’s defense spending is likely to heat up the economy.】

item.title: 中国淡化国债波动对外汇储备的影响
item.description: 中国央行的一位高级官员淡化了国债市场波动对中国外汇储备的影响，他认为中国政府已经实现了外汇资产的多元化，足以减轻这一打击。【原文：A senior Chinese central bank official played down the impact of Treasury market volatility on the country’s foreign exchange reserves, arguing Beijing had diversified its foreign assets enough to soften the blow.】

item.title: 信实股票因盈利创 10 个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）股价创下自 6 月份以来的最大涨幅，此前这家从炼油到零售的印度企业集团公布的第四季度盈利好于预期。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. shares recorded their biggest jump since June after India’s refining-to-retail conglomerate reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称大流行病以来的财政支持仍在推动通胀
item.description: 欧洲中央银行表示，欧元区各国政府在大流行病和乌克兰战争期间采取的援助措施将在未来几年继续刺激通货膨胀。【原文：Aid measures by euro-zone governments during the pandemic and the war in Ukraine will keep stoking inflation in the years ahead, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 在中美僵持之际，泰国希望增加宠物食品和大米出口
item.description: 泰国的目标是增加宠物食品、大米和其他加工食品对美国的出口，而中国的托运人则被关税壁垒拒之门外。【原文：Thailand is aiming to increase exports of pet food, rice and other processed food products to the US at the cost of Chinese shippers who are shut out of the prized market by a tariff wall.】

item.title: 为什么风险投资二级市场现在如此火爆？
item.description: 风险资本投资应该相对简单：你把钱交给一家新公司，帮助它成长，以换取企业的股份。几年后，一旦公司建立起来并能够实现盈利，你就可以通过首次公开募股或收购的方式出售你的股份，从而获得相当于你原始投资额数倍的收益。【原文：Venture capital investing should be relatively simple: You hand money to a new company to help it grow in exchange for a stake in the business. After a few years, once it’s established and able to turn a profit, you sell your interest in an initial public offering or a buyout, yielding a multiple of your original outlay.】

item.title: 太阳能发电量激增，欧洲电价跌至零点以下
item.description: 上周末，欧洲大陆的电价跌破零点，因为晴朗的天气提高了欧洲不断增长的太阳能发电厂的产量。【原文：Power prices on the continent slumped below zero over the weekend as sunny weather boosted output from Europe’s growing fleet of solar parks.】

item.title: 美国购物者为特朗普关税买单，部分商品价格上涨一倍
item.description: 中国折扣零售应用特卖似乎正在将唐纳德-特朗普的新进口税几乎全部转嫁给美国消费者，一些产品的成本增加了一倍多，此举可能会加剧人们对关税带来的通胀影响的担忧。【原文：Discount Chinese retail app Temu appears to be passing on nearly all of Donald Trump’s new import taxes to US consumers, more than doubling the cost of some products in a move that may add to concern about the inflationary impact of tariffs.】
